outline:
1. to tear, rend, pluck
    1. (Qal) to tear, rend
    2. (Niphal) to be torn in pieces
    3. (Poal) to be torn in pieces
    4. (Hiphil) to provide food
kjv_def: catch, [idiom] without doubt, feed, ravin, rend in pieces, [idiom] surely, tear (in pieces).
strongs_def: to pluck off or pull to pieces; causatively to supply with food (as in morsels)
